text: Wide variety of gear for kids learning to ride a balance bike! Great events organised to introduce kids to the sport as well!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Ride Push Move is an exceptional organization that brings the joy of balance biking to children and families in a fun, engaging, and meaningful way! Their events are always well-organized, inclusive, and create a welcoming atmosphere for participants of all skill levels.

The team is incredibly passionate and knowledgeable, going the extra mile to ensure every child feels encouraged and supported. Their focus on promoting active lifestyles and family bonding is truly inspiring.

Ride Push Move workshops was a fantastic experience, and their commitment to quality and community impact is unmatched. Highly recommended for anyone looking to introduce their little ones to the wonderful world of balance biking!

Ride push move has a good selection of high quality gear for kids bikes and balance bikes. They were also very patient and helpful in guiding me in choosing a suitable bike for my child and also taught me how to get him started on the balance bike. Very good service. Highly recommend RPM to fellow parents looking for a safe, high quality bike for their kids.
Got a balance bike for my 2 yo, who loves it! Bike is sturdy and well-built. Great customer service and prompt delivery. Thanks RPM!
Love that it’s so light weight and it’s easy for my child to maneuver and manage the bike on her own!
